about_the_game:
What if you could experience the freedom of riding a motorcycle without all the pollution?

This is what Lin Yu Cheng has envisioned as he works on Aether, his concept motorcycle. This is an e-motorbike embodying the next level of innovation and beauty for sci-fi lovers. And you can have it in your home right now – just download the new DLC, and assemble the model!

About the creator: Lin Yu Cheng is an industrial designer who specializes in transportation design and product design.
He's aim is to ensure that form follows the function of products and transportation, without sacrificing the essence of industrial design.

This new model is connected to a new quest, and new achievement!
Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.

name: Model Builder: Aether DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]

short_description: What if you could experience the freedom of riding a motorcycle without all the pollution? This is what Lin Yu Cheng has envisioned as he works on Aether, his concept motorcycle. This is an e-motorbike embodying the next level of innovation and beauty for sci-fi lovers.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
